articles.author: PTI
articles.title: World Bank projects Indian economy to grow at 7.5% in 2024 - Hindustan Times
articles.description: According to the report, South Asia is expected to remain the fastest-growing region in the world for the next two years.
articles.content:
The Indian economy is projected to grow at 7.5 per cent in 2024, the World Bank has said, revising its earlier projections for the same period by 1.2 per cent.
Overall, growth in South Asia is expec… [+4500 chars]
